DOC.detailed_description: With USDA partner , develop whole-food , multi-component nutrient bar . Previous pilot study demonstrate short-term bar consumption result favorable increase HDL-cholesterol ( HDL-c ) , particularly large-HDL ( HDL-L ) lean overweight/obese individual . Obesity associate poor gastrointestinal health systemic inflammation , also associate low HDL . Our hypothesis carefully formulate nutritional supplement bar deliver whole food matrix correct micronutrient deficiency obese adult beneficial impact index insulin dysregulation metabolic syndrome . The aim project 1 ) characterize effect size index lipid profile , homocysteine , inflammation , insulin resistance , micronutrient level , DNA integrity , hunger satiety , BMI , waist circumference , blood pressure different formulation CHORI bar take twice daily period range 2-8 week . We also evaluate gut inflammation , redox status , tissue metal , DNA integrity novel exploratory assay may serve marker micronutrient malnutrition chronic disease risk . 2 ) Where significant improvement outcome variable observe , attempt `` deconstruct '' bar attempt determine active ingredient responsible change .
